org.eclipse.scada.vi.details.model

Interface SimpleGridComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, CompositeComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleGridComponentImpl

    public interface SimpleGridComponent
extends CompositeComponent
    A representation of the model object 'Simple Grid Component'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Equally
    • Cols

    See Also:
    DetailViewPackage.getSimpleGridComponent()
